description_text:
Would you be open to giving me a 3 percent cõmmission if I generate at
least $5k in rēvenue for your store in this month of September? Reply with
yes if you’re ïnterested.

conversations.body_text: We'd love to hear your suggestions.

Hi
‎
‎Thank you for getting back to me I’m glad to hear you’re open to the 3%
commission partnership!
‎
‎Here’s what I’ll be doing to help increase your sales and get more
qualified traffic to your store:
‎
‎Store Audit & Optimization: I’ll first review your store’s structure,
product pages, and SEO setup. This includes fixing issues like robots.txt,
ownership verification, page speed, and basic product SEO so that Google
can properly index your products.
‎
‎Google Merchant Center Setup: I’ll list your products on Google Merchant
Center and set up Google Shopping campaigns. This ensures your products
appear directly in Google search results when potential buyers are looking
for items like yours, driving highly targeted traffic.
‎
‎Conversion Improvements: I’ll monitor visitor behavior and make
recommendations to improve conversion rates, such as better product
descriptions, trust signals (badges/reviews), and mobile-friendly design
tweaks.
‎
‎Continuous Growth: Once everything is running, I’ll track performance,
refine the campaigns, and share updates so we keep improving results
together.
‎
‎The goal is simple, to bring in more traffic that converts into paying
customers, so we both grow together.
‎
‎Would you like me to start with a quick store audit so I can share the top
issues and opportunities I find? and you can kindly share with me your
WhatsApp contacts so I'll be able to send over the audit This will give us
a clear starting point.
‎
‎Looking forward to your thoughts!
‎
‎Best regards,
‎Abel

On Tue, Sep 16, 2025, 9:10 AM support@simsonn.com

‎I just wanted to follow up on this email thread to see if you’re still
interested in my last message. If yes kindly share your WhatsApp or
Instagram or reach out to me on Whatsapp through +44 7918 362951 for more
details and the implementation roadmap.
‎
‎Best regards.
‎
